Room.Name: Gotland Glenn Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Gotland Glenn Trail, near the road around Lake Kista.
Room.LongDescription: The pass over the mountains to the north is blocked at this time of year, but when you can travel that way you will find it takes you to a vast grasslands. The Gotland Glenn is a mysterious place that some report is inhabited by a mole-like people who have built an entire city under the ground. The wind never stops blowing across the Glenn, and earth-magic is said to work very well there.
